name: Hex Before Christmas
description:
This is a Shmup game made for Shenanijam! I used the theme : "Cursedmas Eve".

btw the game has UNLOCKABLE CHARACTERS try to get them all!

controls:

F4 for fullscreen

Escape_key to pause during gameplay

Tab: you can toggle whether or not the player character follows the mouse

wasd  / arrow keys:  to move around and traverse menus 

left mouse, X_key, Space_key: shoot bullets

right mouse, C_key: use bomb

You can click on menu items with the mouse or use X_key or Enter_key

STORY:

-A young witch was preparing a fireworks spell as a Christmas gift to her friend BUT the spell went wrong and turned Santa Clause evil along with the EASTER BUNNY,  JACK FROST, AND  THE   FIRE ELF (tm)!!!
